Documentation: github.com/bnb-chain/greenfield-go-sdk/pkg/utils 

     1  package utils
     2  
     3  import (
     4  	"encoding/hex"
     5  	"regexp"
     6  	"strings"
     7  	"unicode/utf8"
     8  )
     9  
    10  // EncodePath encodes the strings from UTF-8 byte representations to HTML hex escape sequences
    11  func EncodePath(pathName string) string {
    12  	reservedNames := regexp.MustCompile("^[a-zA-Z0-9-_.~/]+$")
    13  	// no need to encode
    14  	if reservedNames.MatchString(pathName) {
    15  		return pathName
    16  	}
    17  	var encodedPathname strings.Builder
    18  	for _, s := range pathName {
    19  		if 'A' <= s && s <= 'Z' || 'a' <= s && s <= 'z' || '0' <= s && s <= '9' { // §2.3 Unreserved characters (mark)
    20  			encodedPathname.WriteRune(s)
    21  			continue
    22  		}
    23  		switch s {
    24  		case '-', '_', '.', '~', '/':
    25  			encodedPathname.WriteRune(s)
    26  			continue
    27  		default:
    28  			len := utf8.RuneLen(s)
    29  			if len < 0 {
    30  				// if utf8 cannot convert return the same string as is
    31  				return pathName
    32  			}
    33  			u := make([]byte, len)
    34  			utf8.EncodeRune(u, s)
    35  			for _, r := range u {
    36  				hex := hex.EncodeToString([]byte{r})
    37  				encodedPathname.WriteString("%" + strings.ToUpper(hex))
    38  			}
    39  		}
    40  	}
    41  	return encodedPathname.String()
    42  }
    43
